H0.text: what type of government does germany have now. Federal Republic

H1.text: what type of government does germany have now. Parliamentary System

H2.text: what type of government does germany have now. Constitutional Monarchy

H3.text: what type of government does germany have now. Democracy

A4.text: The Chancellor is elected by the federal parliament (Bundestag) on proposal of the President of Germany with a majority of all members of the Bundestag (Chancellor-majority).

A5.text: The Federal Government (German: Bundesregierung) is the chief executive body of the Federal Republic of Germany
